itunes:title: This Is the Old Testament Week 5 with Kelly Minter
title: This Is the Old Testament Week 5 with Kelly Minter
description:
Raechel and Amanda welcome five-time podcast guest, author, and teacher Kelly Minter back to the podcast for Week 5 of This Is the Old Testament. As they walk through the prophetic books of Jeremiah through Joel, they continue to identify a recurring theme—God’s relentless love for His people. Whether discussing hard truths in Ezekiel or promises of restoration in Joel, they continue to remind each other of God’s faithfulness expressed in His Word.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 5 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Old Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the This Is the Old Testament collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-old-testament-week-5-with-kelly-minter/
